Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ExceptionRepresents an exception in the exception handling system
ExceptionContextRepresents the exception context of the program
ExceptionFrameRepresents a frame inside an exception context
SignalMappingRepresents a map between a signal and an exception
